00030 STDMETHODIMP CFusionCDFDataCOM::InterfaceSupportsErrorInfo(REFIID riid)
00031 {
00032         static const IID* arr[] = 
00033         {
00034                 &IID_IFusionCDFData
00035         };
00036 
00037         for (int i=0; i < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]); i++)
00038         {
00039                 if (InlineIsEqualGUID(*arr[i],riid))
00040                         return S_OK;
00041         }
00042         return S_FALSE;
00043 }

00057 STDMETHODIMP CFusionCDFDataCOM::GetHeader(IFusionCDFFileHeader ** pVal)
00058 {
00059         CComPtr<IFusionCDFFileHeader> header;
00060         header.CoCreateInstance(CLSID_FusionCDFFileHeader);
00061         CFusionCDFFileHeaderCOM *pHeader = static_cast<CFusionCDFFileHeaderCOM*>(header.p);
00062         pHeader->SetHeader(&cdf.GetHeader());
00063         header.CopyTo(pVal);
00064         return S_OK;
00065 }
